an6.76:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.76:1.3: Mānaṃ, omānaṃ, atimānaṃ, adhimānaṃ, thambhaṃ, atinipātaṃ.
an6.76:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.76:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.76:2.3: Mānaṃ, omānaṃ, atimānaṃ, adhimānaṃ, thambhaṃ, atinipātaṃ.
an6.76:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
